description: Detects the use of the spoolss named pipe over SMB. This can be used to trigger the authentication via NTLM of any machine that has the spoolservice enabled. Author: OTR (Open Threat Research). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Domain Controllers acting as printer servers too? :)
name: DCERPC SMB Spoolss Named Pipe
